citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on
03/21/2014.
Licensee and APHIS VMO did speak on the telephone to setup business hours and update contact information.
Exit interview was conducted by telephone with the licensee.
